name: Christmasgiftadvisor
0:
”Alexa, open christmas gift advisor”
”Alexa, start christmas gift advisor”
”Alexa, launch christmas gift advisor”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christmas gift advisor
des:
It may just be the perfect time to shop for Christmas gifts for the people you care about. Nevertheless, we all know how this can be a really daunting task to think about the right present for every person- That's time consuming for sure. 
Fear not as we'd already build the Christmas gifts buying advisor skill to save this precious time and come up with the best presents tailored for your loved ones
if you want to open this skill just say:"Alexa, open christmas
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
